name: elrnmpt1d
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c0, c3))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, c0 ∈ ran(c1), s0 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, crn(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, crn(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, crn(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, crn(c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, crn(c1)))
-| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, crn(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, c0))

comment: Elementhood in an image set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
